quote: “If you are under the impression you have already perfected yourself, you will never rise to the heights you are no doubt capable of.”
author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quote: “Rules for happiness: something to do, someone to love, something to hope for.”
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: “God, send me anywhere, only go with me. Lay any burden on me, only sustain me. And sever any tie in my heart except the tie that binds my heart to Yours.”
author: David Livingstone

quote: “The future doesn't belong to the light-hearted. It belongs to the brave.”
author: Ronald Regan

quote: “When you have a great and difficult task, something perhaps almost impossible, if you only work a little at a time, every day a little, suddenly the work will finish itself.”
author: Isak Dinesen

quote: “Total paranoia is just total awareness.”
author: Charles Manson

quote: “Be yourself. Don't worry about what other people are thinking of you, because they're probably feeling the same kind of scared, horrible feelings that everyone does.”
author: Phil Lester

quote: “Sometimes you just have to jump out the window and grow wings on the way down.”
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: “Leaders live by choice, not by accident.”
author: Mark Gorman

quote: “I'm not going to die, I'm going home like a shooting star.”
author: Sojourner Truth

quote: “I AM THE MASTER OF MY FATE AND THE CAPTAIN OF MY DESTINY.”
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: “It has been my philosophy of life that difficulties vanish when faced boldly.”
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: “Books didn’t make me wallow in darkness, darkness made me wallow in books.”
author: Jackson Pearce

quote: “If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “I belive I can fly, I believe I can touch the sky. ”
author: R. Kelly

quote: “You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.”
author: Nancy D. Solomon

quote: “There is no rest for the person who has envy, and there is no love for the person who has bad manners.”
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: “Light is more important than the lantern,The poem more important than the notebook”
author: Nizar Qabbani

quote: “Maybe I hope too much. Maybe I dream too much or maybe I love too much to just give up on you.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence”
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: “Live out of your imagination instead of out of your memory.”
author: Les Brown

quote: “We become what we want to be by consistently being what we want to become each day.”
author: Richard G. Scott

quote: “In life, you need either inspiration or desperation.”
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: “The most powerful magic of all is choice.”
author: Sara Raasch
